text: Linda Thwala (born ) is a South African rugby union player that made 14 appearances for the in 2016 and 2017, including two in the 2016 Currie Cup Premier Division. His regular position is prop. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Sportspeople from Durban Category:Rugby union props Category:Boland Cavaliers players
title: Linda Thwala
